thread.title: Jive Software To Report Third Quarter 2015 Results On Monday, November 9, 2015
thread.title_full: Jive Software To Report Third Quarter 2015 Results On Monday, November 9, 2015

author: admin
title: Jive Software To Report Third Quarter 2015 Results On Monday, November 9, 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 2:00 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Jive Software 
PALO ALTO, Calif., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Jive Software, Inc. (Nasdaq: JIVE), the leading provider of modern communication and collaboration solutions for business, will report third quarter 2015 results for the period ended September 30, 2015, after market close on Monday, November 9, 2015. 
Jive will host a conference call and live webcast to discuss the company's third quarter 2015 results and outlook for the fourth quarter and full year 2015. 
Conference Call: 5:00 p.m. EST / 2:00 p.m. PST 
Domestic: +1-844-492-3729International: +1-412-542-4195 
Webcast: A live webcast may be accessed from the investor relations section of Jive's website at http://investors.jivesoftware.com/ . A replay of the webcast will be available on the website following the live event. 
Telephone Replay: A telephone replay of the call will be available for one week: 
Domestic: +1-877-344-7529 Replay pass code: 10074505 
About Jive Software Jive (Nasdaq: JIVE) is the leading provider of modern communication and collaboration solutions for business. Recognized as a leader by the industry's top analyst firms in multiple categories, Jive enables employees, partners and customers to work better together. More information can be found at www.jivesoftware.com or the Jive News Blog . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/jive-software-to-report-third-quarter-2015-results-on-monday-november-9-2015-300162201.html 
SOURCE Jive Software
